name: Langchain Agents
onCreateCommand: /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install ipykernel && /usr/local/bin/python -m ipykernel install --user --name=python --display-name=Python3 && /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install nbstripout nbdime
postCreateCommand: /usr/local/bin/python -m nbstripout --install --attributes .gitattributes && sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y --no-install-recommends gcc python3-dev graphviz graphviz-dev && pip install --no-cache-dir --requirement requirements.txt && playwright install --with-deps chromium
